name: iobeats-player
description: IO Beats Player — Web3 music player (Web + Mobile bridge).

scripts.release:check-clean:
git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo '
❌ Uncommitted changes detected. Commit or stash before tagging.
' && exit 1)
scripts.release:tag: npm run release:check-clean && git tag v$npm_config_tag && git push origin v$npm_config_tag
scripts.release:tag:rc: npm run release:check-clean && git tag v$npm_config_tag-rc.$npm_config_rc && git push origin v$npm_config_tag-rc.$npm_config_rc
scripts.release:all: npm run release:notes --tag=$npm_config_tag && npm run releas
